Our Story

Rugtomize was born from five generations of Persian rug craftsmanship and a rebellious drive to shake things up. We saw a market flooded with cookie-cutter home décor — so we built something different. A fully personalized, design-first rug platform where creativity isn’t optional — it’s the whole point.

Built in California, Backed by Innovation

Everything is made in our vertically integrated facility in Orange County. Our team blends heritage craftsmanship with modern tech to create ultra-high resolution custom rugs, made for businesses, collectors, and creatives alike.

“Weaving Dreams: The Rugtomize Journey” — From pandemic pivots to the Woven show, we’ve turned challenges into breakthroughs. What started as an idea in a family shop became a movement to turn rugs into a medium of self-expression and branding.

With clients like Netflix, Spotify, and Disney on board, Rugtomize is scaling fast — and still obsessed with the details. Our platform gives anyone the tools to design, approve, and receive a one-of-a-kind rug. All we need is your vision.

Shop Custom Rugs

Our Mission

To innovate the rug-making process, making limitless customization accessible — faster, more affordable, and built around identity. We’re here to help people express who they are from the ground up.

Our Vision

Rugs should speak. Our vision is to transform rugs into personal statements — merging art, branding, and identity underfoot.

Our goal is to pioneer and reinvent the rug industry. For centuries, rugs have been hand-knotted by tradition. Now, we’re designing with precision, speed, and customization at scale — tailored to your taste.
